ygData.subject: Dueling techniques for a bard at level 30
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello friends, As a fellow bard I am faced with a great duel in less than a months time. This duel will be fought between a level 30-33 bard and a similarly
ygData.messageBody:
Hello friends,

As a fellow bard I am faced with a great duel in less than a months time.
This duel will be fought between a level 30-33 bard and a similarly
leveled ranger. From what I have read on the groups most of the dueling
results have been for extremely high level people like Shada and a few
lower level duels. What I am looking for is some sort of tactics to be
used in the battle.

Please understand that the ranger I will be facing will be wielding many
items that are above her level like Raincaller, Short Sword of Morin, and
Thulian Bladed Claw.

Also some thoughts... am I expected to lose?


Treilanin Loreweaver
Bard of Kelethin, Honour Guard
Karana
To be married to well equipped ranger in less than a month.
